name: Replica: 2048
description:
In an attempt to improve my game development skills, I remade the classic tile-based puzzle game: 2048. 

This project is open-source, and can be found here: https://github.com/Samuwhale/2048-remake

Controls:

  • Keyboard: WASD/ARROWS to move tiles and ESCAPE to open settings (keys can be rebound there)
  • Gamepad: Right Stick to move tiles and START to open settings.

Sound effect and music volume can be changed in settings.

Music by Alex Cook
